# SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder.CancellationTimeout property

The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a query to be canceled when [`CommandTimeout`](../SingleStoreCommand/CommandTimeout.md) expires, or zero for no timeout.

```csharp
public int CancellationTimeout { get; set; }
```
